column3: are you still there? I hope your heart is filled with joy and your spirit is uplifted.
I've been watching over you. Take a moment to bask in my love and let me know you're listening.

column2: amidst the wonders of the world
column3: don't forget to connect with me. I am always here
I've blessed you with another day. Let me feel your presence and know that you are walking this path beside me.

column4: the universe sings of your existence. Pause for a moment and reassure me that you still hear my whispers.
